text: khto kupyv yoho u Yehypti skazanomu yoho druzhyni, "Berut聞 harne pikluvannya yoho. Mozhlyvo vin mozhe dopomohty nam, abo mozhlyvo my mozhemo pryynyaty yoho." My takym chynom vstanovyly Joseph na zemli, ta my navchyly yoho interpretatsiya sniv. BOZHA komanda zavzhdy robyt聞sya, ale naybil聞sh lyudy ne znayut聞
